short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: View a random NFT from recent sales on OpenSea

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Daily NFT is an app/extension that features a random NFT asset from real-time sales on the OpenSea marketplace. The app allows users to view the NFT image and selected data about the NFT asset directly in the browser without having to navigate through the OpenSea website. It also allows the user to click directly through to the OpenSea marketplace profile for the featured NFT asset. The refresh button allows the user to generate another random NFT asset from recent sales. The Daily NFT app is a fun and easy way to get inspired by what is currently trending and selling on the top NFT marketplace. 

Disclaimer: The Daily NFT uses the OpenSea API and is not affiliated with OpenSea.
